title: Why I Want Normal Draft Pick
body:
The reason I want Normal Draft Pick is simple.

I. Never. Want. To. See. Vayne. Ever. Again.

I've had enough of her, doesn't matter if she's in the current specific meta or not, she'll always be in at least two of your games each day.
You can't escape her being in your matches.

Vayne players just wont fuck off.

Riot please, give us Draft Pick Normals so I can realise my dream of never seeing Vayne played ever again.

Look at team builder, i never play it but im guessing its que times are around 4 mins which is too much for some players.

I know the reason as to why we don't have it.

How will that help?

You assume you will be Banning every game or something?

Lo-el

The magic of having a premade team. Even in the event that I don't have a full five man premade, three or four still works well enough to give me first pick.

So yeah, I will be banning every game.
So if you played say.. Scrabble, you would remove the letter E because it's too stronk?

That would certainly give an interesting twist to scrabble, I'll have to try it next time I play.
Unfortunately no one likes to play scrabble with me because my vocabulary is too large, so it wont happen for some time.

But you won't be able to use the word "Penis" anymore.

The highlight of every good game of scrabble.

Furthermore, props to people actually knowing what scrabble is. Less twelvies than I thought.

Riot recently released the discovery that the majority of their playerbase are Uni students or older.
I too am a Uni student working my arse off to one day have a PhD in Biotech.

This would just be stupid...
Unless it is another part so theirs:
1) Normal
    Blind Pick.

2) Normal
     Draft Pick.

Also just because its draft pick doesn't mean she will be banned because your not god or Cheesus you wont get to ban every game.(and if you do your a lucky bastard)
I've come to only really play these days in premade teams, so given that the smallest team I premake with is typically three, then I have incredibly good odds of only ever being first pick.

What is even wrong with Vayne?

and don't say "What isn't wrong with Vayne."

Well for starters I hate the champ, and the people who typically play her.

I also hate Silver Bolts, it is far too powerful.

But most of all I hate that I see Vayne in over 90% of my games. There is what about twenty marksmen champions yet I see this one in more games than any other.
I want her gone.

Counter-picking. 

It's a huge part of ranked play, but there is no way to actively practice it. Blind Pick is great to pull together a team with great synergy. Then 5 minutes in you realise you're hard countered in every lane. There are almost no skills from the Blind Picking process that translate across to Ranked play, and frankly it sucks when the outcome is decided at the loading screen.

No, it's not a matter of counter-picking when it comes to me not wanting to see Vayne.

I want draft pick so I can ban her EVERY GAME no exceptions. That way effectively she'll not exist in the game for me, and I will never see her again.

I don't care if it's a wasted ban, it's not like any of the "important" bans are difficult to counter.
